    The Shahid Lab

    Department of Plant Biology, Ecology and Evolution, Oklahoma State University

    We study interspecies RNA communication and epigenetic regulation in parasitic plants and beyond. See our research and publications to learn more about what we do, and meet our current lab members! Feel free to reach out to Saima if you are interested in joining the lab or collaborating on research projects.
